name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA: Motto Okawari, Rin, Len, Luka
summary: The second Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA DLC was released by SEGA on the PSN Store on 1 July 2010. It featured 18 songs sung by Kagamine Len/Rin and Megurine Luka (2 songs by Len, 7 songs by Rin, and 9 songs by Luka), high-quality polygon PVs of all the songs, 'Toeto' Luka minigame, and special Len/Rin and Luka themes for PSP XrossMediaBar (XMB) menu.
